testcase.name: Ensure profile users are not able to sign in to their account with an invalid password using UP
testcase.system-out: Given the Upgrade user navigates to the homepage............................passed And the Upgrade user clicks on the "Sign in here" link from the top nav.....passed And the user enters a invalid email address in UP...........................passed And the user enters an invalid password in UP...............................passed When the user clicks on the "Sign In" button in UP..........................passed Then the Upgrade user should see the "The email address or password are not correct" message.passed
